name: women
description: Discover the latest trends and fashion staples in our women's clothing collection. From jackets and dresses to shirts and shoes, elevate your style with our versatile and chic designs.

name: men
description: Step up your wardrobe with our collection of men's clothing. Explore our range of blazers, shirts, pants, and accessories that offer classic and contemporary styles for any occasion.

name: kids
description: Dress your little ones in style with our adorable and comfortable kids' clothing. From vibrant dresses and cozy sweaters to playful t-shirts and pants, find outfits that reflect their personality.

name: accessories
description: Complete your look with our stylish accessories collection. Whether you need statement jewelry, belts, scarves, or bags, discover the perfect finishing touches to elevate your ensemble.
